comment.body:
> [ornataweaver](#comment_17_139zVkd4AsZqs9qSYk6ypPDAqDcjPCmRm4): Suggestion: Show links to the connected peers in the globe.

Auto add conneted peers to new zite's address is better.

> [nofish](#comment_311_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): I have added some changes to prevent problems: Only zero trackers accepted, Stop discovering new trackers after it found 5 working ones.

How to build zero tracker ? Can give user an option to choose to share all trackers?

@Nofish
Take care yourself, your country is dangerous, too. The COV-2019 is outbreaking in Europe.

###Go out and wear a mask ÔºÅ
